title: Kill steal / secure
body: what is your opinion on 'KS' from teammates is it always bad or sometimes good?

replies.body:
Its always kill secure.

the only time i get abit salty is when i do 99.9% of the damage and someone else just AA's and gets the kill.

Depends how often it happens.

If at the end of laning phase your have a 6-0-0 Soraka and a 0-0-6 ADC, you might be kinda fuked.

As a support player, I will normally stop autoing/attacking when the target is low, this has sometimes resulted in a teammates dying because they played stupidly or simply had no cooldowns to finish the kill and died trying to do it.
I've learnt its better to just not worry about who gets the kill unless its 100% guaranteed.
pretty good point

If they're dead, nobody protects the turrets.
Anything else is fluff.

(also, if you ace and back, i'm gonna come and find you, don't care where.)

but what if you ace the enemy team who are securing baron, with your 4 teammates dead, two inhibitors down, one lane a minion wave away from destruction and super minions on their way to nexus turrets?

Correction:
if you ace and shop, i'm gonna come and find you, don't care where.
Is it alright to shop if you ace then recall at critical health and you're fast enough to buy an item or two while healing? (That HAS happened before, trust me)

If you ace, there's no enemies.
Which is usually a good reason to DO SOMETHING.
You can shop when there's no free dragon/baron/turret/inhib/NEXUS/stuff to save from destruction.

> fast enough to buy an item or two ***while*** healing

Not scan through the shop for a minute after you got back your health.

What's the difference? Even if you take 0 seconds at the shop, it's still 8 secs for recalling and up to a two-minute walk to get back to the action. The enemy has respawned by then, so you accomplish nothing.
So basically, if you get the ace but need to back to defend turrets/inhib/nexus (or even get health/mana) you're still not allowed to shop while healing? Is that it?

You understood perfectly the first post, but i'll play along...
Why do you need to heal if the enemy has been aced and you're nowhere near their spawn point?
To prepare for when they respawn. You're not expecting them to respawn with no health/mana, are you?

Yeah, in three minute's time i'll heal up.
(unless there's a Karthus or Jinx or Ashe or other global adcs, in which case i'll heal in a minute or so)
I do that all the time. I just open the shop while I'm recalling.

Always good, unless the support does it...

...

Yer...
tbh i coudlnt care less if the support gets the kill, it gives me free farm in the lane which turns into equal if not more gold then the kill is worth and experience to snowball.
This.
i laugh at kids who think kill steal exists
The main reason i would call it a kill steal over a kill secure is if the person taking it is 0/10/0, more because they just reset their kill gold.
